Class Hpostposition

java.lang.Object
  |

All Implemented Interfaces:
javax.accessibility.Accessible, java.awt.event.ActionListener, java.util.EventListener, java.awt.image.ImageObserver, java.awt.MenuContainer, javax.swing.RootPaneContainer, java.io.Serializable, javax.swing.WindowConstants
public class Hpostposition
extends javax.swing.JFrame
implements java.awt.event.ActionListener

Hpostposition class identify any errors in the postpositions and correct it and generate the suggestion That types are accusative, genetive, locative, dative.

See Also:

Returns:

check_accusative

public static boolean check_accusative(byte[] bstr,
                                       int blen)
Checks the error is in accusative case marker They are vida, pola, kondu, nokki, pattri, kuriththu, suttri, vittu, thavira, munnittu, vendi, otti, poruththu, poruththavarai.
Returns:
true - error is in this type, false - error is not in this type and sets the correct suggestion according to the case marker.
